com.example.jacob.mybrary

Class FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.jacob.mybrary.FileManager

  • public class FileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    FileManager handles interactions with the file system and simplifies the process of accessing files. Created by Jacob on 2015-11-04.

                          throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the json string from a given file.
        Parameters:
        file - File object representing the desired file.
        Returns:
        Returns a string containing the contents of the file.
        Throws:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Returns a boolean indicating whether the file exists.
